title: Making a Simple Appointment by Phone

content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to call a hairdresser, or 'parrucchiere', to make a simple appointment for a haircut.
To politely say 'I want' in Italian, it's very common to use 'Vorrei', which means 'I would like'.

data.meaning: I would like to make an appointment

data.tip: The 'gn' in 'buongiorno' sounds like the 'ny' in the English word 'canyon'.

content.title: Stating Your Purpose
content.setting: You are calling the hairdresser ('il parrucchiere') to make an appointment.

extract_info.user_name: Extract the user's name from their message

conversation_flow.title: Say you would like an appointment for a haircut
Hairdresser asks when you would like to come

content.text: Great start! Now let's learn the vocabulary you need to negotiate a day and time for your appointment.
To talk about a specific time, like 'at two o'clock', you use 'alle' before the number. For example, 'alle due'.

content.title: Negotiating a Time
content.setting: You continue the phone call with the hairdresser, answering their question about when you can come.

conversation_flow.title: Hairdresser asks for morning or afternoon
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Venerdì... va bene. La mattina o il pomeriggio?

conversation_flow.title: Hairdresser suggests 2pm
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Il pomeriggio alle due. Va bene?

content.text: Almost there! Let's learn how to confirm the details and end the call politely.
It's always a good idea to repeat the agreed day and time to make sure you have it right.

data.tip: The 'ci' at the end sounds like the 'chee' in the English word 'cheese'.

content.title: Confirming the Appointment
content.setting: You are about to finalize your appointment details with the hairdresser.

conversation_flow.title: Hairdresser confirms 3pm is available
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Sì, alle tre è possibile. Perfetto.

conversation_flow.title: Hairdresser confirms the appointment details
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Bene. Allora l'appuntamento è venerdì alle tre.

conversation_flow.title: Confirm by repeating the day and time
Hairdresser confirms and says see you Friday
Thank the person and say goodbye
